p.k: Gumball and Darwin rent a film called "A Pony's Tail" to watch with Anais, but keep getting distracted on their way home. / Anais throws a party but no-one shows up as she has no friends or social skills. / When Anais reveals that she's in the grade above them at school, Gumball and Darwin's eyes are suddenly opened to a whole new world of other students at Elmore Junior High. / When they find Anais training herself for a brutal showdown, Gumball and Darwin realise that their sister is being pestered at school by an annoying kid: Billy.
